backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Mapping of frontend file paths to short descriptive summaries of their roles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH theme variables, dark mode overrides, and global element styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template mounting the React app root and loading the main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component rendering the game view and cursor trail overlay.
frontend/src/features/game/CapClickerVie: Core game UI combining stats, upgrades, click button, smooth scroll areas, and click feedback.
frontend/src/features/game/components/Cl: Floating animated feedback element showing cap gains at the click position.
frontend/src/features/game/components/Cu: Canvas-based cursor trail rendering motion blur with reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/features/game/components/Sm: ScrollArea wrapper adding smooth wheel scrolling via requestAnimationFrame with reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/features/game/components/Up: UI component rendering an upgrade card with cost, level, effects, and purchase button styling and logic.
frontend/src/features/game/upgrades.ts: Defines the Upgrade interface and lists click and automation upgrade data with costs, scaling, and effects.
frontend/src/features/game/useCapClicker: Hook managing clicker game state including caps, upgrades, costs, and idle generation loop.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider handling Internet Identity authentication lifecycle and exposing identity state and login/clear actions.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Hook detecting and updating user reduced-motion preference.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty file indicating no backend queries are needed for the clicker game.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base and component styles plus game-specific theme tokens and UI classes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a utility function combining clsx and tailwind-merge for class name merging.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering the root component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom color tokens, extended shadows, animations, and plugin support for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing Cap Clicker’s features, state versioning, architectural notes, and a list of implemented game features and requirements.
